mutants.code:
def add(x, y):
    sum_without_carry = x | y
    carry = (x & y) << 1
    while carry != 0:
        x = sum_without_carry
        y = carry
        sum_without_carry = x ^ y
        carry = (x & y) << 1
    return sum_without_carry

def add(x, y):
    sum_without_carry = x ^ y
    carry = (x & y) << 1
    while carry == 0:
        x = sum_without_carry
        y = carry
        sum_without_carry = x ^ y
        carry = (x & y) << 1
    return sum_without_carry
